content.rendered:
Directed by Julie HÃ©bert. Tazbah Chavez. Michael Cuesta. Clark Johnson. Marlee Matlin. Jonathan Mostow. Billy Porter. Milan Cheylov. Michael Chiklis. Brad Turner. Sameh Zoabi.

Written by Howard Gordon. Howard Gordon. Jimmy McGovern. Daniel Pearle. Daniel Pearle. Keith Josef Adkins. Tazbah Chavez. Sonay Hoffman. Chip Johannessen. Chip Johannessen. Maile Meloy.

Cast Farrah Aviva (Ava’s Mother). Megan Boone (Jenny). Molly Parker (Laura Broder). Rachel Bilson (Alison). Whitney Cummin/Epgs (Brenda). Michael Chiklis (Scott Harmon). Malcolm-Jamal Warner (Kendall Gomillion). J Harrison Ghee (Kevin Milstead). Kiowa Gordon (Derrick). Chris Coy (Jamie Barnes). Jill Hennessy (Lynn Harmon). Reid Miller (Danny). Stephanie Nogueras (Ava). Karen LeBlanc (Alisa Gomillion). Natalie Benally (Shandiin). Sean Kleier (Brian Tanner).

Language English.

Producers Matt Code. Nick Iannelli. Alex Gansa. Howard Gordon. David Shore. Jose Cabrera. Jacob Cohen-Holmes. Michael Cuesta. Glenn Geller. Erin Gunn. Sonay Hoffman. Jimmy McGovern. Daniel Pearle. Louise Pedersen. Hannah Schneider. Frank Siracusa. Roxy Spencer.

Production All3Media America. Fox Entertainment. Paramount Television.

Creators Howard Gordon(developed for American television by). Jimmy McGovern(based on the BBC UK television series created by).

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 15

Status OnGoing (2023–)
